about_the_game:
Here is our first project, which we wanna publish on Steam! That is our biggest dream!
We work for a long time and try to develop a high-quality, original game which is not available in this mode and this style.

It is a top-down racing game with arcade/realistic elements

Our goals and targets
- Very balanced, perfect driving car physics
- Multiplayer mode
- a league mode, also designed and fitted to LAN-Partys
- Time Attack mode
- Replays
- Track Editor
- Car Editor
- a working community
- Alpha & Beta Testers among the players
- active/active participation on development steps

The concept / gameplay
This is a new type of top-down arcade racing game, which is played and watched from the top in 3D. Various routes, cars and physics can driven in different modes like time-attack mode, lan or over the www.
We have decided to use standard keyboard as input device.

Each car will get tire wear, damage and fuel consumption.
This means that pit-stops are needed depending on lap distance, drifts and fuel consumption.

Each driven second contributes to your game progress, awards points, a leaderboard and very detailed statistics to be found on the GentRacing Site.

One of the core elements of GentRacing will be the league mode, for big and funny online battles. Compare your skills in different skill-levels and be the first GentRacing World Champion - under all participants of the game,

We will inform you regularly about the state of development and look forward to your comments.

greez


GentRacing Team

legal_notice: This game is subject to country restrictions. GentRacing is not playable and downloadable in the following countries: Finnland, Sweden, Norway and Lithuania

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 12.04 or newer (just like our player, the editor will run on most ‘modern’ 64-bit Linux distributions, but official support is only provided for 64-bit Ubuntu 12.04 or newer)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern Nvidia, AMD, or Intel graphics card with vendor-supported graphics drivers
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 12.04 or newer (just like our player, the editor will run on most ‘modern’ 64-bit Linux distributions, but official support is only provided for 64-bit Ubuntu 12.04 or newer)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern Nvidia, AMD, or Intel graphics card with vendor-supported graphics drivers
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.99+
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Grafikkarte: DX9 (Shadermodell 3.0) oder DX11 mit Feature-Level 9.3-Fähigkeiten.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.99+
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Grafikkarte: DX9 (Shadermodell 3.0) oder DX11 mit Feature-Level 9.3-Fähigkeiten.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: required

name: GentRacing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: required

short_description: A top-down racing game with arcade/realistic elements - with TrackEditor, League System, Steamintegration, Controllersupport, etc.
